title: #82 – Simon Sinek: Leadership, Hard Work, Optimism and the Infinite Game
description: Simon Sinek is an author of several books including Start With Why, Leaders Eat Last, and his latest The Infinite Game. He is one of the best communicators of what it takes to be a good leader, to inspire, and to build businesses that solve big difficult challenges.
